branchCategory.name: V1*0, 3 Port Solenoid Valve for VV100, D-sub Connector, Plug-in Type
branchCategory.description: Series VV100 is suitable for both direct or bracket mounting and can also accommodate various piping sizes including our miniature 2mm one-touch fittings. Energy saving has also been considered as individual valves can be ordered with a power saving circuit as each valve can be manually turned off, safe maintenance is guaranteed.
